Explanations
Bioverita: This variety is an organic, newly bred, variety. It has been cultivated from the very outset in organic conditions, to best adapt to organic cultivation. FREEZO KS
 la63
Dark, later winter leek with upright growth and without bulb formation. Stalk length approx. 17 cm. Due to its good hardiness it is suitable for over-wintering and harvesting in spring.
Type: winter

Additional XPath Data 2:
HALDOR KS
la44
New selection for harvesting in autumn, long stems, dark green, upright foliage. Less prone to bulb-forming.
Type: autumn

HILARI
la42
Medium-green in colour, with long, closed stems. Suitable for harvesting in late summer, autumn, or early winter. Tolerates moderate frost.
Type: autumn, summer

SIEGFRIED 2
la50
Slow growing, medium green variety, stands up well, for overwintering outside. Tolerates strong frosts, stem rather slow to develop in spring. Sow in May for spring harvest. Excellent flavor.
Type: winter
